SEARCH

Package Domain

package Domain
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AlgorithmController
    AlgorithmController is responsible for the creation of Keyboard distributions, given a TransitionMatrix and a chosen available algorithm.
    Alphabet
    Represents an alphabet containing a set of unique characters identified by a key.
    DomainController
    The DomainController class acts as a controller for the domain layer, managing interactions between input handling, keyboard operations, and other domain-related functionalities.
    GreedyAlgorithm
    The GreedyAlgorithm class implements a greedy algorithm to determine the positions of the characters on a keyboard based on the given transit table.
    InputController
    The InputController class manages the creation and manipulation of Alphabets and TransitionMatrices.
    Keyboard
    The Keyboard class represents a keyboard, with its unique key and a distribution of characters.
    KeyboardAvaluator
    The KeyboardAvaluator class provides a method to evaluate the layout of characters on a Keyboard based on their positions and a TransitionMatrix.
    KeyboardController
    The KeyboardController class manages the creation, deletion, modification, consultation and evaluation of keyboards.
    QAPAlgorithm
    QAPAlgorithm implements an algorithm based on the Quadratic Assignment Problem (QAP), used to create a Keyboard.
    QAPAlgorithmController
    The QAPAlgorithmController class manages the interaction between the GreedyAlgorithm and QAPAlgorithm for obtaining the positions of characters on a keyboard using the Quadratic Assignment Problem (QAP) algorithm.
    QAPPartialSolution
    Represents a possible solution by the QAP Algorithm for the creation of a Keyboard.
    Text
    The Text class represents a form of TransitionMatrix generated from an input text by associating transitions between characters with their frequencies.
    TransitionMatrix
    Represents a Transition Matrix associated with an Alphabet for a specific key.
    WordFrequencyList
    The WordFrequencyList class represents a specialized form of TransitionMatrix that associates word frequencies with transitions between characters in an Alphabet.
